group.description: Group of visualizations to be shown together in the hub.

icon.description: FontAwesome specification for an icon that represents the visualization.

url.description: Mustache template for a URL to the visualization. Uses the ID in combination with `visualization_url` configuration if not provided.

language_parameter.description: Query string parameter key to use to add the currently selected language in the URL to the visualization.

blog.description: Reference to a blog post about the visualization.

fragment.description: URL fragment for the blog post.

language.description: Language code for the language the blog post is written in.

download.description: Custom download URL for the visualization.

nginx.description: Whether the visualization is hosted by the proxy on the visualization site. This is `false` when the visualization is hosted on another site, such as the prediction site.

index.description: Whether to display the visualization as a block on the visualization site hub.

repo.description: Name of the repository where the code for the visualization is stored.
